short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dysaid helps you customise webpage text with your choice of colours and create patterns for improved readability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dysaid is a browser extension designed to aid individuals with dyslexia by introducing patterns in text through colours.
Users can choose between auto mode, which adjusts colour schemes based on the background colour of the webpage for improved readability, and custom mode, allowing for personalised colour palettes. Dysaid also offers domain-specific settings, enabling tailored colour patterns for different websites.
